TopicTitle: KErbal getting killed by g-force limit on takeoff (realism overhaul)

Articles.Content: Title says it all, The rocket isn't off the ground and my Kerbal is dead from reaching g-force limit. Whats wrong ?

There isn't enough info here for anyone to help you. You need to include several pieces of information, like a list of mods you are using and logs. 

Please read the "How To Get Support" sticky at the top of the forum page or click [here](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92229-How-To-Get-Support-%28READ-FIRST%29)
A picture of the craft would be useful too. Is it wobbly?
